nodes.text: The Galaxy at War (GAW) expansion for the Star Wars PocketModel TCG (Trading Card Game) was to have been the next set after the Secret Weapons expansion to be produced by WizKids. Scheduled to have been released in 2009, it is unclear at this time if the expansion will be distributed after the sale of the gaming company—and the PocketModel trademarked games—by Topps to the National Entertainment Collectors Association (NECA) without the Star Wars brand license.
